name: conjugally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or relates to marriage or the relationship between two married people, especially their sexual relationship: I felt conjugally obliged to support my husband in this matter. Most Western societies are conjugally structured.
More examplesFewer examplesShe set up a support network that would help the conjugally bereaved to cope with their grief.The woman claimed in court that her husband refused to live conjugally with her.Her art questioned the ideal of the conjugally based family unit.
